content: **skill level** beginner if you need any help check out www thewoobles com 1 for tutorials or reach out to wooble on@gmail com 2 **completely new to amigurumi ** buy a penguin crochet kit 3 from my etsy shop 4 or directly from my website 5 it includes an in-depth tutorial on how to get started with crochet and comes with all the materials you need after going through the kit you ll be on your way to being able to make all the woobles patterns **materials** - 24 yds of blue acrylic worsted-weight yarn - 2 yds of white acrylic worsted-weight yarn - 2 yds of yellow acrylic worsted-weight yarn - 2 10mm plastic safety eyes - polyfill - tapestry needle - stitch marker - 4mm crochet hook **size** 3 5 in 8 9 cm tall **language** english with us terminology --------------- © 2019 the woobles justine t all rights reserved pattern may not be copied or distributed in any form online or offline finished items may be sold in small quantities as long as credit for the pattern is given to justine t 1 https //www thewoobles com 2 mailto wooble on@gmail com 3 https //www thewoobles com/crochet-kits/penguin-crochet-kit 4 https //www etsy com/listing/676029601/penguin-amigurumi-crochet-starter-kit ref=shop_home_feat_3&frs=1 5 https //www thewoobles com/crochet-kits/penguin-crochet-kit
